title: Indiana's Kurtis Rourke is a rare QB import from our northern neighbors
description: When Indiana kicks off the 12-team College Football Playoff at Notre Dame, it will be led by a Canadian. That's rarer than you might think.
author: Jake Trotter

title: Al Golden's long road to redemption at Notre Dame
description: The detail-oriented defensive coordinator for the Irish has found peace in South Bend.
author: Andrea Adelson

title: Fury weighs in career-heaviest as both fighters remain fully clothed!
description: A leather-jacket wearing Tyson Fury weighed in just under four stone heavier than Oleksandr Usyk ahead of their heavyweight rematch as both fighters remained fully clothed as they stood on the scales.

title: Fury's beard 'must be cut!' Team Usyk to push complaint
description: With just one day to go before Tyson Fury's world heavyweight championship clash with Oleksandr Usyk, the rival camps are locked in a dispute over a replacement official and the length of the former champion's beard.

title: Fully clothed Fury four stone heavier than Usyk
description: A fully clothed Tyson Fury weighs in four stone heavier than champion Oleksandr Usyk for Saturday's heavyweight world title fight in Saudi Arabia.

title: Van Gerwen enjoys comfortable opening victory
description: Michael van Gerwen and Stephen Bunting both move into the third round of the 2025 PDC World Darts Championship with victories at Alexandra Palace on Friday.

title: Indiana-Notre Dame live updates: Welcome to the new CFP era
description: The first game of the new 12-team College Football Playoff is here. Can the Hoosiers snap the Irish's impressive win streak when it matters the most?
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Joel Embiid returns to 76ers' starting lineup after missing 1 game with sinus fracture
description: Embiid, Paul George and Tyrese Maxey will play together for only the fourth time this season.
author: Yahoo Sports
